trans-unit.source: Provides schema compilation options for the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> class This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 提供的結構描述編譯選項<xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>類別，這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The XmlSchemaCompilationSettings class provides schema compilation options for the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: XmlSchemaCompilationSettings 類別提供<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>類別</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>的結構描述編譯選項

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings.EnableUpaCheck%2A> property specifies that the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> should check for Unique Particle Attribution (UPA) violations when schemas in the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> are compiled.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings.EnableUpaCheck%2A>屬性會指定<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>應該檢查唯一物件屬性 (UPA) 違規時結構描述中的<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>編譯。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings.EnableUpaCheck%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> should check for Unique Particle Attribution (UPA) violations.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>應該檢查唯一物件屬性 (UPA) 違規。

trans-unit.source: When the EnableUpaCheck property is set to `false`, validation will be performed based on the following rules.
trans-unit.target: 當 EnableUpaCheck 屬性設定為`false`，將根據下列規則執行驗證。

trans-unit.source: If there is a choice between a strong type and a wildcard, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> will pick the strongly typed particle as illustrated in the following schema and Xml examples.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有強式型別與萬用字元，之間選擇<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>會挑選強類型的物件中的下列結構描述與 Xml 範例所示。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>

trans-unit.source: `<xs:sequence>` `<xs:any namespace="##any"/>` `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` `</xs:sequence>` In the following Xml, the `A` element will be associated with `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` in the schema.
trans-unit.target: `<xs:sequence>` `<xs:any namespace="##any"/>` `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` `</xs:sequence>`在下列 Xml 中，`A`項目相關聯`<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>`結構描述中。

trans-unit.source: If there is a choice between two strongly typed elements, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> will pick the first one.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個的強型別項目之間有選擇<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>會選擇第一個。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>

trans-unit.source: `<xs:sequence>` `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string"/>` `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string"/>` `</xs:sequence>` In the following Xml, the `B` element will be associated with `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` in the schema.
trans-unit.target: `<xs:sequence>` `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string"/>` `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string"/>` `</xs:sequence>`在下列 Xml 中，`B`項目相關聯`<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>`結構描述中。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> should check for Unique Particle Attribution (UPA) violations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>應該檢查唯一物件屬性 (UPA) 違規; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
